channel.title: Intune on credibleDEV
channel.description: Recent content in Intune on credibleDEV

item.title: Find Apps and Policies Assigned to Azure AD Groups
item.description: This guide explains how you can use the ADAM Tool to find out what apps, profiles, policies, remediations etc. are assigned to an Azure AD group.

item.title: Dynamic Azure Intune Groups Based on Installed Software
item.description: This guide will show you how to use PowerShell with Azure and Intune to dynamically add devices to Azure Groups based on installed software.

item.title: Managed Desktop Icons and Shortcuts in Intune
item.description: Managing desktop icons and shortcuts in Intune isn't straightforward but there are PowerShell scripts to help make this easy.

item.title: Intune Hardware Hash Import During Task Sequence
item.description: Easily collect and import the Intune device hardware hash using an SCCM task sequence while deploying Windows 10.

item.title: Deploy HKCU Registry Keys Using Intune
item.description: Deploying registry keys to the HKCU hive in Intune isn't straightforward. This guide will show you how to deploy keys to the current user hive.

item.title: How to Deploy a Scheduled Task in Intune
item.description: Deploying a scheduled task in Intune isn't difficult. This post will walk you though all of steps needed to deploy your scheduled task in Intune.

item.title: Deploy PowerShell Scripts in Intune - 3 Easy Methods
item.description: 3 easy methods to deploy PowerShell scripts in Intune. Single scripts, proactive remediations and Win32 app methods.
